title: Intensive Short-Term English for Bible and Theology (EBT) Course (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English reading and writing proficiency, foundational biblical background knowledge
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment using smartphones, focusing on real-life connected project implementation

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret Christian theology-related English texts (sermons, papers, biblical commentaries) with over 70% accuracy
Learners can write and present an English essay (approximately 300 words) based on biblical themes
Learners can deliver an English presentation incorporating 50 theological terms with cultural contextualization

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
